articles.title: Huawei Mate 50 Pro pre-orders open in Europe with a lower than expected starting price - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Huawei has now started selling the Mate 50 Pro in Europe. Still the company’s current flagship, the Mate 50 Pro has arrived in Europe for €100 less than Huawei advertised it for last month. Arguably one of the best camera flagships released this year, the lac…
articles.content: Last month, Huawei confirmed via press release that the Mate 50 Pro would soon be available from 1,299 in the Eurozone, or 1,399 with 512 GB of storage. With Huawei confirming that Mate 50E and Mate … [+1432 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: European Union bans sale of petrol and diesel cars from 2035 to boost electric vehicle uptake - ABC News
articles.description: The European Union strikes a deal to effectively ban the sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2035, aiming to speed up the switch to electric vehicles and combat climate change.
articles.content:
The European Union has struck a deal on a law to effectively ban the sale of new petrol and diesel cars from 2035, aiming to speed up the switch to electric vehicles and combat climate change.
